property.name: Rules
property.value: While voting, you get an additional vote. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Fiora, no matter is settled until King Brago offers an opinion.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - When Council Guardian enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for blue, black, red, or green. Council Guardian gains protection from each color with the most votes or tied for most votes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Will of the council - When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Parley - Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Then each player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Academy Elite enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards. {2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Academy Elite: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever Marchesa's Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Secrets, like coins, are easy to steal."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest mana value among artifacts you control. You may put an artifact card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for time or knowledge. If time gets more votes, take an extra turn after this one. If knowledge gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - Choose target instant or sorcery spell. Starting with you, each player votes for denial or duplication. If denial gets more votes, counter the spell. If duplication gets more votes or the vote is tied, copy the spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for sickness or psychosis. If sickness gets more votes, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. If psychosis gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent discards two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Drakestown Forgotten enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards. {2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Drakestown Forgotten: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player sacrifices a creature. Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When every right is voted away, only rage remains.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their guards are soft, ready to welcome a sharp dagger."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 4/4 red Ogre creature token. Starting with you, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, and a land from among the permanents controlled by the player to their left. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ignition Team enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of tapped lands on the battlefield. {2}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Ignition Team: Target land becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Whenever Scourge of the Throne attacks for the first time each turn, if it's attacking the player with the most life or tied for most life, untap all attacking creatures. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Pay 3 life: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything comes with a price. Especially revolution." - Grenzo, dungeon warden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Morbid - Create three 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And Muzzio says my arguments have no teeth." - Selvala, ranger of the Lowlands

property.name: Rules
property.value: Realm Seekers enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the total number of cards in all players' hands. {2}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Realm Seekers: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Parley - Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Then each player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Parley - When Selvala's Enforcer enters the battlefield, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Selvala's Enforcer. Then each player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Brago, King Eternal deals combat damage to a player, exile any number of target nonland permanents you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target player draws two cards, then discards two cards. −2: Gain control of target artifact. −6: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell that targets one or more permanents, gain control of those permanents."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Dack's Duplicate enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has haste and dethrone. (Whenever it attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All who set foot in Paliano are pawns in someone's play for power." - Marchesa, the Black Rose

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender. {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Flamewright deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Grenzo, Dungeon Warden enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {2}: Put the bottom card of your library into your graveyard. If it's a creature card with power less than or equal to Grenzo's power, put it onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Will of the council - When Magister of Worth enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for grace or condemnation. If grace gets more votes, each player returns each creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield. If condemnation gets more votes or the vote is tied, destroy all creatures other than Magister of Worth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Other creatures you control have dethrone. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) {1}{U}{R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Parley - {T}: Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, add {G} and you gain 1 life. Then each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Lowlands refuse to suffer at the whims of the High City."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Parley - Whenever Woodvine Elemental attacks, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, attacking creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Then each player draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal Aether Searcher as you draft it. Reveal the next card you draft and note its name. When Aether Searcher enters the battlefield, you may search your hand and/or library for a card with a name noted as you drafted cards named Aether Searcher. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draft Agent of Acquisitions face up. Instead of drafting a card from a booster pack, you may draft each card in that booster pack, one at a time. If you do, turn Agent of Acquisitions face down and you can't draft cards for the rest of this draft round. (You may look at booster packs passed to you.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draft Canal Dredger face up. Each player passes the last card from each booster pack to a player who drafted a card named Canal Dredger. {T}: Put target card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Will of the council - At the beginning of your upkeep, starting with you, each player votes for carnage or homage. If carnage gets more votes, sacrifice Coercive Portal and destroy all nonland permanents. If homage gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draft Cogwork Grinder face up. As you draft a card, you may remove it from the draft face down. (Those cards aren't in your card pool.) Cogwork Grinder enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards you removed from the draft with cards named Cogwork Grinder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draft Cogwork Librarian face up. As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, put Cogwork Librarian into that booster pack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal Cogwork Spy as you draft it. You may look at the next card drafted from this booster pack. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Paliano's creations provide ample opportunities to plot the downfall of a neighbor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal Cogwork Tracker as you draft it and note the player who passed it to you. Cogwork Tracker attacks each combat if able. Cogwork Tracker attacks a player you noted for cards named Cogwork Tracker each combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draft Deal Broker face up. Immediately after the draft, you may reveal a card in your card pool. Each other player may offer you one card in their card pool in exchange. You may accept any one offer. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal Lore Seeker as you draft it. After you draft Lore Seeker, you may add a booster pack to the draft. (Your next pick is from that booster pack. Pass it to the next player and it's drafted this draft round.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal Lurking Automaton as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Lurking Automaton. Lurking Automaton enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Lurking Automaton.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draft Whispergear Sneak face up. During the draft, you may turn Whispergear Sneak face down. If you do, look at any unopened booster pack in the draft or any booster pack not being looked at by another player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Spy for today. Plan for tomorrow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal Paliano, the High City as you draft it. The player to your right chooses a color, you choose another color, then the player to your left chooses a third color. {T}: Add one mana of any color chosen as you drafted cards named Paliano, the High City.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Flying Apex Hawks enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 2/6 white Wall creature with defender. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sacred rites repurposed to fight an ancient threat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May starving fleas birth a thousand generations on your stubborn hide, cow!" - Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As long as Pristine Angel is untapped, it has protection from artifacts and from all colors. Whenever you cast a spell, you may untap Pristine Angel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have not died until I consent."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "End this. What I seek is far greater." - Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den." - Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a creature with flying dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Soulcatcher.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their spirits walk the winds and fill my soul."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just a moment of perfect grace and sanctity is enough." - Kal Lior, leonin elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Unquestioned Authority enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has protection from creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After Gideon cleansed the Ninth District, none of the ganglords challenged the Boros.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As my father taught, ‘Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I prefer loyalty to be a matter of respect, not of magic. But one does what one must." - Kaalia of the Vast

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying {1}{W}: Creatures you control with defender can attack this turn as though they didn't have defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its pulsating cry shatters bonds of iron, granite, and servitude.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots." - Anitan, Ondu cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{U}: Tap target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wind is forceful, yet ephemeral. It can knock a dragon out of the sky, yet pass through the smallest crack unhindered." - Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw four cards, then choose X cards in your hand and discard the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ideas came flooding in so fast that they couldn't all be contained.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Flying When Crookclaw Transmuter enters the battlefield, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Creation is a paradox. It hatches from its opposite." - Olka, Mistmeadow witch

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Enclave Elite enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Long thought to be extinct, flocks of gryffs reappeared with Avacyn's return.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Jetting Glasskite becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bolt struck with a flash, and there was a terrible sound, as of glass shattering, but the creature was unharmed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Your maximum hand size is increased by one.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any good prospector must sift the gold from the sand."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Screaming Seahawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Screaming Seahawk, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Superior force meets woefully inadequate object. What paradox were you expecting?" - Azguri, archmage of Evos Isle

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, choose a land type. When Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has landwalk of the chosen type. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius." - Varil, Neurok partisan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take my hand and dance to the music of the winds."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible." - Gorghul, augur of skulls

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is how wars are won - not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed." - Yurin, royal assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile Ill-Gotten Gains. Each player discards their hand, then returns up to three cards from their graveyard to their hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Urza thought it a crusade. Xantcha knew it was a robbery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mirror: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage." - Hildin, priest of Avacyn

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game. Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies." - Savra

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) Quag Vampires enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The end is justified in being mean. Or something like that."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X cards from your graveyard. You draw X cards and you lose X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His family was a small price to pay for the dark gifts that called to him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player loses 1 life for each creature they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Urborg, the instigators of each new rebellion are soaked in the blood of the last.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Morbid - That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. (The next time this creature would be destroyed, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.) Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morbid - When Wakedancer enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste Whenever Barbed Shocker deals damage to a player, that player discards all the cards in their hand, then draws that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fervid shamans willingly submit to shockers in hopes of glimpsing the fortunes of the future.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to any target. Morbid - Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours." - Onean sergeant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Deathforge Shaman enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A flame-kin is always formidable, but feeding its fire with a sorcerous gift grants it the power to devastate armies.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight." - Karn

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Heartless Hidetsugu deals damage to each player equal to half that player's life total, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hidetsugu held over a dozen oni in blood oath. At his touch, rocks scorched. At his word, cities burned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their language may be a cacophonous agglomeration of chittering snorts and mad barking, but the message they send is all too clear.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crispy! Scarback! Load another volcano-ball." - Stumphobbler Thuj, orcish captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Haste Skitter of Lizards enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Sulfuric Vortex deals 2 damage to that player. If a player would gain life, that player gains no life instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Volcanic Fallout deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can we outrun the sky?" - Hadran, sunseeder of Naya

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it wrong to go straight for what you want? Sneaking is for cats and goblins." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When enchanted creature dies, create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}{G}{G}. Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only when we journey into the unknown can we find the impossible." - Cyrul the Wanderer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gamekeeper dies, you may exile it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Howling Wolf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Howling Wolf, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Morbid - Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Werewolves are an unholy mix of a predator's instinct and a human's hatred." - Alena, trapper of Kessig

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Hydra Omnivore deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals that much damage to each other opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We should learn from the hydra. It never plays favorites; it devours everyone equally." - Thrass, elder druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of creature cards from among them and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all." - Sildark, artificer of Omu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Pelakka Wurm enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. When Pelakka Wurm dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It eats what it wants to eat - which is anything that moves.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." - Dejara, Giltwood druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never start a fight you can't finish." - Padril, council guardian

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wurms become so big, a single scale can be used as a roof for a human dwelling.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you." - Saidah, Joraga hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the treetops, unseen by many, lurks chittering, skittering death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Terastodon enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to three target noncreature permanents. For each permanent put into a graveyard this way, its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Multikicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} any number of times as you cast this spell.) When Wolfbriar Elemental enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token for each time it was kicked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Players can't cast spells during combat. {R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why listen to the mumblings of wizards when the lash speaks true?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land. (You can't cast this spell unless you have legal choices for all its targets.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anarchy comes in many forms: social, individual, Gruul . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Dimir Doppelganger becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have haste. Sacrifice Fires of Yavimaya: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a strain of music: easy to remember but impossible to catch." - Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger. {B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger. {G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Spontaneous Combustion deals 3 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heat of battle" is usually a metaphor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose a creature card name. Reveal the top four cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Target player mills cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is not that you will go mad. It is that you will beg for madness." - Volrath

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.) Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle." - Kessla, Sylvok shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lanterns carved from the mystic stones of the Reito Mines were said to light the way of lost souls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runed Servitor dies, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.

property.name: Rules
property.value: No more than one creature can attack each combat. No more than one creature can block each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color they choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. As long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best defense is a good offense.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a charge counter on Mirrodin's Core. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Mirrodin's Core: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Does it reflect the future that once was or the past that can never be?
